alert.note: Alert for Barron; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:51PM CDT until July 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... Northeastern Barron County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spooner to 5 miles west of Haugen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Haugen around 600 PM CDT. Rice Lake around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Weyerhaeuser. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
